name: Google Play Music ID File
summary: Learn about ._PLAYMUSICID files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: _PLAYMUSICID files have no filename prefix and are simply named ._playmusicid.

_PLAYMUSICID files are not meant to be opened. Instead, they are used to verify the Google Play Music user. You can open a _PLAYMUSICID file and view the contents with a text editor. The files are located in the SD card in the following directory:

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
